actions.description: The kiddywidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the kiddywidget (escape DC 8).
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) lightning damage.
actions.name: Tail

conditionImmunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Kiddywidget

specialTraits.description: The kiddywidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
